perks_map.name: SLASHED Pricing
perks_map.description: Starting Slayer quests is half price.

perks_map.name: Slayer XP Buff
perks_map.description: Earn 25% more Slayer XP.

perks_map.name: Pathfinder
perks_map.description: Gain rare drops 20% more often.

perks_map.name: Lucky!
perks_map.description: Gain +25 Pet Luck.

perks_map.name: Mythological Ritual
perks_map.description: Mayor Diana will sell the Griffin pet, which lets you find Mythological Creatures and tons of unique items.

perks_map.name: Pet XP Buff
perks_map.description: Gain 35% more pet XP.

perks_map.name: Sharing is Caring
perks_map.description: Unlocks 2 more Exp Share slots in your pets menu and increases the Exp Share rate by +10%!

perks_map.name: Marauder
perks_map.description: Dungeon reward chests are 20% cheaper.

perks_map.name: EZPZ
perks_map.description: Gain 10 extra bonus score in Dungeons.

perks_map.name: Benediction
perks_map.description: Blessings are 25% stronger.

perks_map.name: Fishing XP Buff
perks_map.description: Gain 50 ☯ Fishing Wisdom on public islands.

perks_map.name: Luck of the Sea 2.0
perks_map.description: Gain 15 α Sea Creature Chance.

perks_map.name: Fishing Festival
perks_map.description: Start a special fishing event during the first 3 days of each month! Fish and fight dangerous Sharks and earn unique Shark loot.

perks_map.name: Double Trouble
perks_map.description: For every 1 α Sea Creature Chance, gain +0.1 ⚓ Double Hook Chance.

perks_map.name: Prospection
perks_map.description: Stone Pickaxe Mining minions work 25% faster.

perks_map.name: Mining XP Buff
perks_map.description: Get +60 ☯ Mining Wisdom on public islands.

perks_map.name: Mining Fiesta
perks_map.description: Schedules 5 Mining Fiesta events that last for 7 Skyblock Days each. Earn 2x drops and extra unique loot, including Refined Mineral and Glossy Gemstone. Grants +75 ☯ Mining Wisdom during the event, which is only active on Public Islands.

perks_map.name: Molten Forge
perks_map.description: Decrease the time it takes to forge items by 25%.

perks_map.name: Sweet Benevolence
perks_map.description: Earn +30% more Candy, Gifts, and Chocolate from duplicate Rabbits during their respective events.

perks_map.name: Extra Event
perks_map.description: Schedules an extra event during the year, out of: Spooky Festival, Mining Fiesta, and Fishing Festival.

perks_map.name: A Time for Giving
perks_map.description: Party Chests and Party Gifts can be obtained while this event is active.

perks_map.name: Chivalrous Carnival
perks_map.description: Schedules a Carnival in the Hub that is active throughout the entire year.

perks_map.name: Pelt-pocalypse
perks_map.description: Obtain 1.5x more Pelts from Trevor The Trapper. Hunt a new trapper mob and purchase items from Talbot.

perks_map.name: GOATed
perks_map.description: Jacob's Farming Contest brackets include up to 10% more players each.

perks_map.name: Blooming Business
perks_map.description: Garden Visitors will give out Fine Flour and appear more often. Additional visitors may visit your Garden. Higher rarity Visitors are more likely to show up & will provide 10% more Copper.

perks_map.name: Pest Eradicator
perks_map.description: The duration of Pesthunter Phillip's ☘ Farming Fortune bonus is now 60m. Decreases the spawn cooldown of Pests by 20%.

perks_map.name: Long Term Investment
perks_map.description: The elected Minister will appear in the next Election with all of their available perks.

perks_map.name: Volume Trading
perks_map.description: Double the item quantity from Shen's Auction, Shen's Special, and Rift Shen's on the year Diaz is elected. Two additional Shen's Special auctions will be available for the duration of Diaz being elected as Mayor.

perks_map.name: Stock Exchange
perks_map.description: Participate in the Stonks Auction for a chance to win Stock of Stonks! Trade them for extravagant items at the ⏣ Trade Center.

perks_map.name: Shopping Spree
perks_map.description: Increase daily NPC buy limits by 10x.
